name: Vulcan Guard
description:
Vulcan Guard is a game made for the Brackeys Game Jam focused on getting increasingly chaotic as you battle waves with your trusty Gear Gun.

Controls (also explained in game):

WASD to move

Click to shoot

Bullets will bounce off walls until they hit an enemy, only then will they come back to you.

Credits:

Programming: Nathcra

Art: Nathcra

Audio: Nathcra

Font: Zekronz (https://zekronz.itch.io/pixel-font-pack)

Off screen marker code by Game Endeavor: https://game-endeavor.itch.io/

Tools:

Engine: Godot

Art: Aseprite

Music: Beepbox

SFX: BFXR

Feel free to give feedback in the comments! This is my first top down shooter, so there's probably a lot of improvements I can make.
